page.title: 10MORE ABOUT THE ANGEL
page.content: The most popular drink that Mr.Bell sells is Draught beer and the most expensive spirit is Brandy.He also sells chocolate,sweets,nuts and crisps.We asked him if he ever gets Drunken People in the pub,He said No, he didn't encourage it but if somebody got silly that person would be asked to leave the premises.The biggest bottle he has got is one that holds whisky which,when full holds 1 gallon and the smallest bottle is a bottle with herbs for Stomach aches.He show us the Skittle Alley another bar with team photos. In the cellar the beer barrels are kept cold in the Summer and slightly warm in the Winter.In a storeroom we saw how the beer is forced up to the bars by compressed gas or is pumped up by hand.
